Yang Hyong Sop Meets Angolan Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Angolan Delegation 
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a friendly talk with an Angolan delegation headed by Antonio Goma, vice-governor of Cabinda Province, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall yesterday.
 Present there were Choe Su Hon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and officials concerned.

Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Hong Song Ryul
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Sends Wreath to Bier of Late Hong Song Ryul
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Il yesterday sent a wreath to the bier of KPA Lieutenant General Hong Song Ryul, who was honored with "Kim Il Sung Order", to express deep condolences over his death.

articles.content:
Message of Greetings to President of Zimbabwe
    Pyongyang, April 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message�@of greetings to Robert G. Mugabe, president of Zimbabwe, on April 12 on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of the foundation of�@the Republic of Zimbabwe.
 Expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations which exist between the two countries would continue to grow�@stronger, the message wished the president and his people greater success in the work for defending the sovereignty of the country�@and national interests.
